hired_date.description: This is the first date of work of an employee.

termination_date.description: This is the last date of work of an employee. Reset value = null when Employment Status = Active or Onboarding

confirmation_date.description: This is the date when the company confirms the employee has passed probation. This probation confirm date can take place before the end of probation period.

extension_date.title: Probation Extension Date
extension_date.description: This field will contain a date value if the original probation period is extended This field will contain a null value if the probation period is not extended
